official_title: A bill to prohibit Federal agencies from obligating funds for appropriations earmarks included only in congressional reports, and for other purposes.
short_title: Obligation of Funds Transparency Act of 2005

summary.text: Obligation of Funds Transparency Act of 2005 - Prohibits a Federal agency from obligating funds made available in an appropriation Act to implement an earmark that is included in a congressional report accompanying such Act, unless the earmark is also included in that Act.
